rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0001
rows.name: Outstanding!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0002
rows.name:
It thanks to Tora becoming Driver that
Tora come to this place!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0003
rows.name: Blades and Drivers most best ever!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0004
rows.name: That remind Tora!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0005
rows.name:
Boss, Nia!
Tora need little consultation.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0006
rows.name: Uh, a consultation? With us?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0007
rows.name: Tora have big problem right now.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0008
rows.name: Recently...Tora finally realized.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0009
rows.name: Tora is...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0010
rows.name: Tora is...?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0011
rows.name: Tora is not very useful in battle!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0014
rows.name: Why friends silent?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0015
rows.name: Oh, uh... We're just a bit surprised.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0016
rows.name:
I mean, I just never really took you for
the self-assessing type.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0017
rows.name: Too cruel!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0018
rows.name: Nah, I mean, you fight just fine, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0019
rows.name: ...Hana deserve all the credit.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0020
rows.name:
She pass weapon and do all the things
so Tora can fight like real Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0021
rows.name:
Tora sometimes think, if he remove
program of Hana, Hana fighting
alone would be most efficient...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0022
rows.name:
Seriously...?
Wow, you go girl.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0023
rows.name:
That why Tora just feel like
small furry ball and chain!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0024
rows.name: Well, er...I wouldn't go that far...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0025
rows.name:
Anyway, Tora wonder if there any
point to Tora still being Driver...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0026
rows.name:
Maybe it better for everyone if Tora
retire and assume supervisor duty
on sideline...?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0027
rows.name: Oh, Tora...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0028
rows.name: Nia, what do you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0029
rows.name: What shall I ask Tora?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0030
rows.name: Why did you want to be a Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0031
rows.name:
What's the most important thing,
for a Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0101
rows.name: It not clear to Tora anymore...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0102
rows.name:
Starting with Grampypon, dearest
wish of family was to successfully
create artificial Blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0103
rows.name:
So it natural that Tora start to wish
it too.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0104
rows.name:
Well, do you know why your grandad
wanted to make an artificial Blade?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0105
rows.name: Surely it because...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0106
rows.name: He want to be famous!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0107
rows.name: That sounds like a lame reason...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0108
rows.name: But Nopon Driver is rare thing!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0109
rows.name:
Nopon who become Driver
almost sure to become celebrity!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0110
rows.name: Was that your motivation as well then?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0111
rows.name:
Mmmehhhh...
Not exactly.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0112
rows.name: Tora want to be like you, Boss!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0113
rows.name: Like me?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0114
rows.name:
At first, Tora simply yearn to be Driver,
not think too much about it.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0115
rows.name:
But after me travel with you, Boss and
friends, he start to think different!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0116
rows.name:
Saving persons in need,
facing all challenges...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0117
rows.name:
Boss is Tora's idea of perfect
Driver!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0118
rows.name:
It...feels kinda strange when you say
that to my face...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0119
rows.name:
Rex, a perfect Driver? I'm not
convinced. But it looks like you've
got a clear goal in mind, Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0120
rows.name: Hey, hold on...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0121
rows.name:
Honestly, that's all you need! Tora,
you should keep being a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0122
rows.name:
As long as you have goals to achieve,
there's no reason for you to stop.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0123
rows.name: And your Blade will help you in that.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0124
rows.name:
Hana shouldn't have to fight alone.
You need to be right there with her.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0125
rows.name: It fair point...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0126
rows.name:
Thank you, Boss!
Thank you, Nia!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0127
rows.name:
Tora promise he will strive to be best
Driver ever!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0201
rows.name: Tora been thinking about that a lot...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0202
rows.name: Love towards Blade is important!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0203
rows.name: ...L-love?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0204
rows.name: Not an answer I was expecting...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0205
rows.name: Tora observe and Tora analyze...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0206
rows.name:
And Tora note, all Drivers have
love for their Blades!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0207
rows.name:
Example! Boss love Homura,
and Nia love Byakko!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0208
rows.name: I love Homura?!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0209
rows.name: R-Rex and Homura...?!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0210
rows.name:
Love that Tora feel for Hana is also
unsurpassed thing.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0211
rows.name:
But just because Tora have love,
not mean Tora can necessarily be
Driver...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0212
rows.name: Yeah, but still...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0213
rows.name: H-hang on, Rex.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0214
rows.name:
We're getting bogged down here.
Can we just straight up ask Hana
and be done with this?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0215
rows.name:
That's a great idea.
Let's get Hana here.

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0216
rows.name:
Hey, Hana.
What would you do if Tora said
he wanted to quit being a Driver?

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0217
rows.name:
Hana probably break down in tears,
is what!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0218
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meh-meh!
Tora work to be best Driver he can!

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0220
rows.name: Well that was pretty easy...

rows.label: kizunatalk013_msg0221
rows.name:
O-oh, yeah...not bad, not bad. *sigh*
(Rex and Homura...)
